Reviews.Title: amazing resolution and low-light capture without flash
Reviews.Author: Nelz
Reviews.Content: The few times that I've used this camera it had surprised me and everyone around me as to how well built it is. Aside from the ruggedness the resolution of the pictures, even in the Camera's LCD, is unlike I've ever seen on any compact digital camera. I took it to an Afrojack concert and the video quality of it in low light was remarkable. My friend's iPhone nor my android came close to that video quality. The pictures also didn't need any flash for things in the picture to be visible, from the light show, to the big screen flashing, to the crowd of people.The floating wrist strap made me comfortable when I took it with me while surfing. And the rest is good to have laying around for when you need it. A little pricy but completely worth it.
